name: Lost & Found
description:
Trapped in the Devils fog for so long,
Found my way out the cloud through a song,
Praid to my God above, Tell me what's wrong,
Never been lost, But now I'm found -X2

I've never been the type to smoke Hash, 
But somehow I always ended up where the smoke was at,
I guess it was all the friends I had, I don't know,
But everywhere we would go, We would blow,
In the whip bumping Khalifa tracks,
Headed to John's house just to get some Tatt's,
We were bad, We thought it was cool ditching school,
Drinking, Smoking, Chilling, We were fools,
We always got down to doing work,
But I promise momma, I never pushed no work,
I know it hurt, Watching your son doing drugs,
Because I'm the only one, and even then you still gave me that love,
Unconditional, Uncritical, Unlimitable, and that was pivotal,
Just know that I'm a changed man,
and I give it up to God because he made me who I am.

Trapped in the Devils fog for so long,
Found my way out the cloud through a song,
Praid to my God above, Tell me what's wrong,
Never been lost, But now I'm found -X2

Yea, My only motive was to fade my vision,
Back in the days, When it was my only mission,
Fog my mind, Block my heart, Feeling what I'm missing,
Moving body, No control in my intermission,
Feel my pain, broken gears in my transmission,
Leaking knowledge on the highway - Never missed it,
God picked it up , put it back in my distance,
Never could pay him back for the things I mentioned. 

Trapped in the Devils fog for so long,
Found my way out the cloud through a song,
Praid to my God above, Tell me what's wrong,
Never been lost, But now I'm found -X2
